briefdescription.para: Function adds two input matricies and reutrns a new matrix, addition is multithreaded. Function adds two input matricies, of the same shape, and returns a new matrix of the same shape as the input matricies. The addition is multithreaded using pthreads, which may decrease computation time for large matricies relative to unthreaded 'mat_add' function.

detaileddescription.para: Note function returns NULL if input matricis are NULL or of different dimensions.

parameterdescription.para: A pointer to matrix a in same shape as matrix b
A pointer to matrix b in same shape as matrix a

simplesect.para: tensor_2d* A pointer to a matrix, whos elements are the sum of the corresponding elements in matricies a and b.

briefdescription.para: Function subtracts second input matrix from first and reutrns a new matrix, subtraction is multithreaded. Function subtracts matrix 'mat_b' from matrix 'mat_a' and returns a new matrix of the same shape as the input matricies. The subtraction is multithreaded using pthreads, which may decrease computation time for large matricies relative to unthreaded 'mat_subtract' function.

detaileddescription.para: Note function returns NULL if input matricis are NULL or of different dimensions.

parameterdescription.para: A pointer to a matrix from which matrix 'mat_b' should be subtracted
A pointer to the matrix which should be subtracted from matrix 'mat_a'.

simplesect.para: tensor_2d* Pointer to a new matrix, whos elements are the corrspoding elements in matrix 'mat_a' a minus the corresponding elements in matrix 'mat_b'.
